definition: wonderful/great/delightful/very kind/generous
enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
idea/meaning/thought/to think/wish/desire/intention/to expect/to anticipate
to think/to consider

sentences.english: Bh, really. we've that many clothes, how happy we are!
sentences.chinese: 是啊，主人对我们真够意思，我们有这么多套衣服呢。

sentences.english: Say you won't tell, Joe—that's a good feller.
sentences.chinese: 乔，你说你不会说出去，这才够意思啊。

sentences.english: "Gee, that was a delish dinner, " she said as we left the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: “哈，这顿饭真够意思，”离开餐馆时她说。

sentences.english: New custom costumes also sent went up use, it's not it is bh.
sentences.chinese: 新定制的演出服也派上了用场，这不嘛还算够意思。

sentences.english: As dawn, at least to have a "color" was terrific.
sentences.chinese: 至于黎明，至少也得来个“血色”的才够意思。

definition: (coll.) to be a true friend
to show deference or praise publicly
You're really quite something!/You're just amazing!
to uphold justice/to be loyal (to one's friends)/to stick by
erhua variant of 哥們|哥们[ge1 men5]
to do as promised/to be as good as one's word/to honor one's word/to mean what one says
to show respect for/to think highly of
to regard sb as an outsider
lit. to destroy the bridge after crossing the river (idiom)/fig. to abandon one's benefactor upon achieving one's goal
(affectionate form of address for a male who is not very much younger than oneself) my boy/old pal
sensitive/tactful
kind and honest/generous/sincere
don't mention it/no formalities, please
to feel grateful to sb/to appreciate the kindness
elder brother (often used self-referentially)/(form of address between male friends) old chap/buddy
to have the nerve/what a cheek!/to feel no shame/to overcome the shame/(is it) proper? (rhetorical question)
